Package edu.ncsu.csc216.business.model.stakeholders

Class PropertyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.business.model.stakeholders.PropertyManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Landlord
    public class PropertyManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements Landlord
    Class that manages the property. Has a list of clients and rooms available to lease. Can add or remove clients or units, filter by type.
    Author:
    Jacob Robinson
